charges.charge_description: 21:846=ND.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS From in or about 4/11 and continuing until in or about 7/11 in Rock Island County in the CDIL, Dft did conspire with other persons to knowingly and intentionally distribute and possess with intent to distribute at least 280 grams of crack, a Schedule II controlled substance. In violation of 21 USC 846. (1)

21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE On or about [7/20/11] at Rock Island County in the CDIL, Dft did knowingly and intentionally distribute crack cocaine. In violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C). (2)

21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE On or about [7/28/11] in Rock Island County in the CDIL, Dft did knowingly and intentionally distribute and possess with intent to distribute at least 28 grams of crack, a Schedule II controlled substance. In violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B). (3)
